content.prompt: The Peace of Westphalia (1648) resulted in which of the following?

choices.label: Undisputed control over central Europe by the Hapsburgs
The creation of a strong central government to rule the Holy Roman Empire
The guaranteed independence of numerous small German states
An end to the persecution of Protestants in the Hapsburg Empire
An end to the Hundred Years' War

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
